component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
position true java.lang.String Position of the unit, can be "top","bottom","center","left","right".
width false java.lang.Integer -1 Width of the unit in pixels, applies to left and right units.
height false java.lang.Integer -1 Height of the unit in pixels, applies to top and bottom units.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean false Makes the unit resizable.
closable false java.lang.Boolean false Makes the unit closable.
collapsible false java.lang.Boolean false Makes the unit collapsible.
scrollable false java.lang.String Makes the unit closable.
style false java.lang.String Style to apply to container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style to apply to container element.
header false java.lang.String Text for header.
footer false java.lang.String Footer for header.
minWidth false java.lang.Integer -1 Minimum width boundary in resizing.
maxWidth false java.lang.Integer -1 Maximum width boundary in resizing.
minHeight false java.lang.Integer -1 Minimum Maximum height boundary in resizing. boundary in resizing.
maxHeight false java.lang.Integer -1 Maximum height boundary in resizing.
gutter false java.lang.String 4px Gutter of the layout unit.
zindex false java.lang.Integer -1 zindex property to control overlapping with other elements
visible false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies visibility of unit.
collapsed false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies toggle status of unit.
proxyResize false java.lang.Boolean true Defines the resize preview mode.
collapseSize false java.lang.Integer -1 Size of the unit when collapsed.
